content.title: Kettlebell One Arm Push Press Instructions

items: Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and hold a kettlebell in one hand at shoulder height.
Bend your knees slightly and engage your core.
Press the kettlebell overhead, extending your arm fully.
Lower the kettlebell back down to your shoulder.
Repeat for the desired number of reps on one side before switching to the other side.

content.title: Kettlebell One Arm Push Press Form & Visual
Kettlebell One Arm Push Press Benefits

items: Targets multiple muscle groups including shoulders, triceps, and core
Improves upper body strength and power
Can be modified for different fitness levels and goals
Can be done with minimal equipment and space
